org.apache.edgent.analytics.math3.json

Interface JsonUnivariateAggregator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonStorelessStatistic

    public interface JsonUnivariateAggregator
    Univariate aggregator for JSON tuples. This is the runtime implementation interface of JsonUnivariateAggregate defined aggregate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear(com.google.gson.JsonElement partitionKey, int n)
      Clear the aggregator to prepare for a new aggregation.
      void increment(double value)
      Add a value to the aggregation.
      void result(com.google.gson.JsonElement partitionKey, com.google.gson.JsonObject result)
      Place the result of the aggregation into the result object.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear(com.google.gson.JsonElement partitionKey,
           int n)
        Clear the aggregator to prepare for a new aggregation.
        Parameters:
        partitionKey - Partition key.
        n - Number of tuples to be aggregated.

      • increment

        void increment(double value)
        Add a value to the aggregation.
        Parameters:
        value - Value to be added.

      • result

        void result(com.google.gson.JsonElement partitionKey,
            com.google.gson.JsonObject result)
        Place the result of the aggregation into the result object. The key for the result must be JsonUnivariateAggregate.name() for the corresponding aggregate. The value of the aggregation may be a primitive value such as a double or any valid JSON element.
        Parameters:
        partitionKey - Partition key.
        result - JSON object holding the result.
